channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 04:04 An alarm has been sounded in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 04:04 An alarm has been sounded in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Донецка_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 04:04 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 04:04 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. item.title: 🔴 00:28 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: 🔴 00:28 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
